item.description:
By popular demand!

We'll meet at OM Lounge for drinks in Harvard Square (message me if you need directions) at 8:30pm then head over to Club Oberon at 9:45ish for the show!

The Donkey Show at Club Oberon! If you haven't heard about this yet, you must have been sleeping the past few months!

Check it out at http://www.cluboberon...


Use this link to get your ticket ASAP - the 10:30 show on December 19, 2009

See you there!

~Beth


p.s. This show ends in early January so this may be our only chance to check out the show! Don't miss out!
item.how_to_find_us: RSVP and I will be in touch with details on how to find the group!
item.name: The Donkey Show!
